text: Kim Tu-il (Korean: 김두일) is a North Korean politician. He is a member of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and Chairman of the Provincial Party Committee of South Pyongan Province. ==Biography== After serving as Vice-Chairman of the South Pyongan Province Party Committee, on October 7, 2017, at the second Plenum of the 7th Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea he was elected a member of the Central Committee and Chairman of the South Pyongan Province Party Committee.“北 김여정, 정치국 후보위원으로…당 중앙위 전원회의서 인사”. 《중앙일보》. 2017년 10월 8일. 2018년 6월 11일에 확인함. He was elected to the 14th convocation of the Supreme People's Assembly representing Saedok electoral district. He was member of the funeral committee of Kim Yong-chun. ==References== Category:Workers' Party of Korea politicians Category:Members of the Supreme People's Assembly Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people
title: Kim Tu-il
